text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1980. ==Events== *29 March - Bamses Venner are selected to represent Denmark at the 1980 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Tænker altid på dig". They are selected to be the thirteenth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Falkoner Theatre in Copenhagen. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *5 June - Lisbeth Østergaard, TV & radio host *16 June - Sara Maria Franch-Mærkedahl, weathergirl ==Deaths== ==See also== *1980 in Denmark
